description: Linus Torvalds just christened the Linux 6.12-rc7 kernel today for what will hopefully be the last release candidate before declaring Linux 6.12 stable next week Sunday...
title: Linux 6.12-rc7 Released: Linux 6.12 Stable On Track For Release Next Sunday

description: The Arch Linux based CachyOS Linux distribution has issued its November 2024 media refresh. Notable this time are pulling a few performance-related patches into its kernel build...
title: Arch Linux Powered CachyOS Pulls In THP Shrinker & AMD Cache Optimizer

description: A set of Linux kernel patches posted on Friday by Meta/Facebook provide for sizable performance optimizations for applications leveraging /proc/kcore such as for debuggers...
title: Linux Optimization Patches Significantly Speed-Up Debuggers Using /proc/kcore

description: Debcow is an experimental implementation of deploying Debian packages on copy-on-write file-systems like Btrfs and Bcachefs. Debcow adapts DPKG to use reflinks for installing packages. With reflinking to the file contents from the Debian package archives rather than copying of files, it can lead to a dramatic speed-up of installing Debian packages: as much as 6x faster on CoW file-systems...
title: Debcow Optimizing Debian Packages For Copy-On-Write File-Systems

description: Building off Friday's release of Wine 9.21, Wine-Staging 9.21 is available as this experimental blend of Wine that carries extra patches for testing/evaluation to enhance the ability for Windows games and apps to run on Linux...
title: Wine-Staging 9.21 Fixes Some Old Game Crashes & Hangs Due To DirectMusic

description: A patch is pending for enabling support for the USB-C model of Apple's latest Magic Trackpad input device under Linux...
title: Linux Support For Apple's Latest Magic Trackpad USB-C Model

description: If this weekend's release of Hyprland 0.45 doesn't suit your fancy, Niri is also out this weekend with a new feature release. Niri is the scrollable-tiling Wayland compositor for an interesting Linux desktop experience...
title: Niri 0.1.10 Scrollable-Tiling Wayland Compositor Brings Many Improvements
